definition.name: Command
definition.description: A root command menu component that provides the base functionality and styling for the command palette interface. It wraps the cmdk primitive component and adds custom styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the command menu

definition.visualLayout: A full-width and height flexible container with rounded corners and a popover background color that serves as the foundation for the command menu interface.

definition.name: CommandDialog
definition.description: A dialog wrapper for the command menu that provides a modal interface. It combines the Dialog component with Command to create a floating command palette.

children.description: The content to be rendered within the command dialog

open.description: Controls whether the dialog is visible

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the open state changes

definition.visualLayout: A modal dialog with no padding that contains a command menu interface

definition.name: CommandInput
definition.description: A search input field component for the command menu with an integrated search icon. It provides the main interaction point for users to filter and search through command options.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the input

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

definition.visualLayout: A flex container with a search icon and a full-width text input with transparent background

definition.name: CommandList
definition.description: A scrollable container that holds the list of command options. It manages the vertical overflow of command items with a maximum height.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the list container

definition.visualLayout: A scrollable container with a maximum height of 300px that handles overflow

definition.name: CommandEmpty
definition.description: A component that displays when no results are found in the command menu. It provides feedback to users when their search yields no matches.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the empty state

definition.visualLayout: A centered text container with padding that displays a message when no results are found

definition.name: CommandGroup
definition.description: A component that groups related command items together with an optional heading. It provides organizational structure to the command menu.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the group

heading.description: The heading text for the group

definition.visualLayout: A container with padding that groups command items and includes an optional styled heading

definition.name: CommandSeparator
definition.description: A visual separator line used to divide sections within the command menu. It helps organize and structure the command interface.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the separator

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal line with subtle styling that spans the width of the command menu

definition.name: CommandItem
definition.description: An interactive item in the command menu that users can select. It supports states for selection, disabled status, and can include icons and shortcuts.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the item

onSelect.description: Callback fired when the item is selected

definition.visualLayout: A flex container with padding that displays an item with optional icon and supports hover and selected states

definition.name: CommandShortcut
definition.description: A component that displays keyboard shortcuts associated with command items. It provides visual hints for keyboard interactions.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the shortcut text

definition.visualLayout: A right-aligned span element that displays keyboard shortcut text in a muted color
